**Steps to reproduce the problem**
Navigate to different files of the project, look at endless lines and inconsistent code.


**What is the expected behavior?**
The code looks clean and neat ;)


**Suggested solutions**
Use [Prettier](https://prettier.io) to automatically format the source code and maintain consistency. It would require one extra large commit to fix the styling or it can be done incrementaly as the source code evolves.
